name: Forest of Color
desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Blanch the Grainfruit, chop the other ingredients, drizzle over the sauce, then stir until evenly mixed. Extremely simple to make, but even more importantly, it's so healthy that no matter how much you eat, you won't feel stressed!

customize.name: Recipe: Forest of Color
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Forest of Color.

customize.name: Delicious Forest of Color
customize.desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Sweet, sour, and many others constitute a forest of flavor for you to wander through, leaving you with a lasting touch of freshness from your taste buds to your heart.

customize.name: Suspicious Forest of Color
customize.desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Each bite of this is no different from eating raw fruits and vegetables straight up... And once you give it any consideration, you realize that you forgot to add sauce.

customize.name: Forest of Color
customize.desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Blanch the Grainfruit, chop the other ingredients, drizzle over the sauce, then stir until evenly mixed. Extremely simple to make, but even more importantly, it's so healthy that no matter how much you eat, you won't feel stressed!

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.
